column4: well I think I found the problem with my mic not working to record. I have a Turtle Beach Santa Cruz card. It has a Cirrus Logic CS 4614/22/24 chipset but apparently the card itself isn't well supported in linux. Ohwell... sound works... I can use an external tuner for tuning my flutes
- i also have a turtle beach - the analog output works fine
I can hear the mic through the speakers. I just can not get it to record
